method.step: Wash the potatos. Put them in pressure cooker pan. Add 1 cup of water. Cook them into pressure cooker for 20 min (or for 3 whistles)
When the cooker cools down, remove the potatos. Cut them into small pieces (of around 1 inch)
Heat the oil in frying pan. Add Mustard seeds. When Mustard seeds crackle add Asafoetida.
Add green chilli, curry leaves and turmeric powder. Heat it for about half a minute. Make sure you stir it at regular intervals
Add the potatos, salt and sugar. Stir it and let it cook for about 5 min.
Garnish it with chopped coriander and the 'aloo ki subji' is ready to serve. (Can serve to about 3 people. Can be consumed with paratha)
